name: Dodge Test 🤾
description:
DOWNLOAD FOR A BETTER GAMEPLAY EXPERIENCE!

LAUNCHED VERSIONS FOR MacOS and Linux! Enjoy it!

Dodge Test is a prototype of game-concept made in 48h for ScoreSpace Jam #13 🕹️ - itch.io. Here you are a test subject and need to avoid all balls, that increase it speed as time pass, to survive how long you can. Use your skills to get top on the Leaderboard!

If you liked the game or want to report a bug, share with us on comments space below!

CREDITS

  • Microsoft windows Icon by Maninder Kaur
  • Mixamo
  • Freesounds
  • Test Subject Model by Voranee

WARNINGS

  • Web version HAVE MANY GLITCHES, prefer downloaded version.
